ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for him whose balance is heavy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he whose deeds shall weigh heavier in the scale
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he whose scales weigh heavier
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those whose good deeds will weigh heavier (on the scale)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So for one whose scales prove heavy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then as for him whose Balance will be heavy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then as for him whose measure of good deeds is heavy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then he whose deeds weigh heavy in the Balance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then, as for him whose scales are heavy (with good works),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then, the one whose good deeds weigh heavy on the scales,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then as for him whose balances are heavy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As for him, whose deeds weigh heavy in the scales,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then, he whose balance (of good deeds) will be (found) heavy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then as for him whose balance (of good deeds) will be heavy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then he whose deeds weigh heavy in the Scale
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for he whose scales are heavy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [101:6] Then as for him whose scales weigh heavy, in that his good deeds outweigh his misdeeds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then, as for him whose scales are heavy (with good works)) as for him whose good works weigh heavy on his scale; this refers to the believer,
